channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Can you wear a Trump or Harris hat to the polls? It depends on where you live
item.description: Nearly half of states have laws restricting what you can wear to vote, according to the National Conference of State Legislatures.
